sentences.sContent: That, like Iran’s main enrichment plant, is roughly half the size of the Pentagon.
sentences.sContent_eng: That, like Iran’s main enrichment plant, is roughly half the size of the Pentagon.
sentences.sCn: 这就像伊朗的主要浓缩工厂，几乎是半个五角大楼的面积。

sentences.sContent: There were at least two other command centers one inside the Pentagon and one inside the American Embassy in Islamabad.
sentences.sContent_eng: There were at least two other command centers one inside the Pentagon and one inside the American Embassy in Islamabad.
sentences.sCn: 当时至少还有另外两个指挥中心，一个在五角大楼，另一个伊斯兰堡的美国大使馆。
